name: Witness (otomir23 Games)
description:
Made in 72 hours for BenBonk's Game Jam #1.

You are a detective who investigates murder cases. In each of them, you have five minutes and four witnesses - the victim's brother, the gardener, the maid, and the killer. Interrogate them and find out which one of them killed the victim. Be careful. The killer and some of the witnesses are lying.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrows - Move.
  • Go to the table and press the number from 1 to 4 on the keyboard to select the killer.

Team:

  • Game by otomir23
  • Music by frunk29
  • Page design by MaKa
